content:
Create a FlexCard. 
To configure specific options, see FlexCard Setup Reference.

Configure optional settings for your FlexCard in the Setup panel of the FlexCard Designer. For example, update a data source, create an event listener, add session variables, and so on.

From the FlexCard Designer, click Setup to open the Setup panel.
The Setup panel in the FlexCard Designer provides multiple configuration options that enable a user to define the behavior of the FlexCard further. 
Repeat Options in the FlexCard Designer
By default, a FlexCard loops through records returned from its data source. The FlexCard displays the list of records in containers called cards.

Add Session Variables to a FlexCard
Set attributes available from a component, or store values from data sources or external systems to access globally on a FlexCard. 

Add an Event Listener to a FlexCard
Add an event listener that listens for an event fired from a component and performs an action in response. 

Enable Multi-Language Support on a FlexCard
Enable multi-language support on a FlexCard from the FlexCard Designer.

Enable OmniScript Support on a FlexCard
Enable the OmniScript Support feature when your FlexCard interacts with an LWC OmniScript.

Limit User Access to a FlexCard with Custom Permissions
Limit user access to a FlexCard by assigning custom permissions.
title: Configuring FlexCard Settings
